name: Healthyfied Wagyu Cabbage Sopas
description: Indulge in a nutritious twist on the classic sopas with our Healthyfied Wagyu Cabbage Sopas. This savory delight is packed with high-quality Wagyu beef, fresh vegetables, and a creamy, rich broth, making it perfect for those seeking a high-protein, low-carb meal without compromising on taste. Ideal for health-conscious individuals looking for healthy recipes that are both comforting and satisfying.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare all the ingredients: Cut the young corn, dice the red onion, shred the Parmesan cheese, slice the Wagyu beef into strips, mince the garlic, shred the mozzarella cheese, and chop the cabbage.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, saut√© the garlic and red onion over medium heat until they're softened and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Wagyu beef strips to the pot and cook until they're no longer pink, approximately 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the full cream milk and bring the mixture to a simmer. Then, add the young corn and cabbage, cooking until the vegetables are tender, about 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Season the sopas with salt to taste, then stir in the shredded Parmesan and mozzarella cheeses until melted and well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Healthyfied Wagyu Cabbage Sopas hot, garnished with additional cheese if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
